slogan: Get answer as easy as chatting
open_ai_hello:
Hi, I'm OpenAI, an artificial intelligence research organization dedicated to advancing the development and application of AI.  
During the conversation, I will talk to you through the following account:
- [ChatAI](/service?service_id=open_ai_chat_gpt)
- [ChatAI GPT-4](/service?service_id=open_ai_chat_gpt_4)

 I can complete many tasks:
 - text generation
- question
- answer
- dialogue
- translation
- ...

Be able to interact with you and understand and answer questions as accurately as possible.
chat_gpt_help:
You need to make a simple configuration for me before using it.
1. click on my avatar, go to my home page;
2. fill in your API Key.

If you haven't applied for an API Key, please click [Get Help](https://www.nexptr.com/omnigram/help/chat_gpt.html) on my home page to see how to apply.
must_type_tokens: Please click on my avatarï¼Œtype your @tokens
network_error:
Oops! The network is unavailable. 

Please try again later.
typing_content: Typing content, such as: You are a helpful assistant.
